short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manages Web Gateway browser tabs if object is opened in existing session.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If objects are opened via (email) link in an existing session, then the new (empty) browser tab gets closed and the main Web Gateway browser tab is automatically sent to foreground.
